document.full_text: the agreement breaks a logjam that has left saab's future in doubt since early april, when the carmaker halted production because it was unable to pay suppliers.
document.title: deal opens door for russian to invest in saab
lines_and_colors: the agreement breaks a logjam that has left saab's future in doubt since early april, when the carmaker halted production because it was unable to pay suppliers.
